description: Contents: Ghazzālī, Kaṿanot ha-filosofim (Doctrines of the Philosophers, Maḳâṣid al-falâsifah), part I (ff. 1r-36(i)v). Pedro de Alcalá (Petrus Hispanus), Compendium of a logical treatise (ff. 37r-52r). Moses Maimonides, Milot ha-Higayon (Treatise on Logical Terminology) (ff. 53r-71v). Sefer ha-Higayon (ff. 72r-94v). Ghazzālī, Kaṿanot ha-filosofim (Doctrines of the Philosophers, Maḳâṣid al-falâsifat), parts II-III (ff. 95r-186v).
title: Collection of philosophical texts
author: Ghazzālī
